hero.title: About the Farm

intro.title: Welcome to Suddha Agriculture & Organic Farms
intro.subtitle: Providing The Finest Products To The Best Feed Suppliers.
intro.para1: Welcome to Shuddha, a proud initiative of Barendra Krishi Udyog (BKU), launched in September 2022 with the commitment to purity and safety in food. Our journey began in Chapai Nawabganj with the motto 'Pledge of Purity,' aiming to connect consumers directly with fresh, processed agricultural products from our own farms.
intro.para2: At Shuddha, we prioritize your health and well-being by providing a wide range of safe and nutritious food options. Our offerings include fresh milk, various types of rice (both perishable and non-perishable), seasonal fruits, jaggery, mustard oil, homemade ghee, pickles, and much more.

promise.title: Discover the Freshness of Nature

organic.title: Organic Farming
organic.desc: We use sustainable farming practices that are environmentally friendly and produce healthy, nutritious food.

quality.title: Quality Products
quality.desc: Our products are grown and processed with care to ensure the highest quality and nutritional value.

service.title: Customer Care
service.desc: We provide exceptional service and care for our customers, ensuring your satisfaction with every purchase.

diversity.title: Diverse Selection
diversity.desc: From fresh milk to seasonal fruits, rice, and homemade products, we offer a wide range of organic options.

promise.bottomLine: We are confident that we are the leading farm in providing agricultural products that ensure food hygiene and safety.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.desc1: We are dedicated to establishing a trustworthy marketplace that stands out in a sea of counterfeit products. Looking ahead, Shuddha plans to expand its product line to include a variety of meats and fish, ensuring affordability without compromising quality.
impact.desc2: We believe in fostering a community of responsible businesses that share our vision for safe food, ultimately benefiting our consumers and contributing to better health for all. Join us on our mission to provide safe, wholesome food for you and your family. Together, we can make a difference!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to contribute to the promotion of agricultural products in Vietnam with a commitment to produce sustainable values that meet international standards and thereby create a fair and competitive market.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: Our vision is to be a prestigious standard system that aims towards sustainable and fair agricultural development where Vietnamese producers can produce and benefit from global markets through equitable opportunities.
